Class ClusterConfigResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.server.resources.ClusterConfigResource

public final class ClusterConfigResource
extends java.lang.Object
    Code for ClusterConfigResource - REST end-point for supporting cluster configurations.

      • getClusters

        public java.util.List<com.netflix.genie.common.model.Cluster> getClusters(java.lang.String name,
                                                                          java.util.Set<java.lang.String> statuses,
                                                                          java.util.Set<java.lang.String> tags,
                                                                          java.lang.Long minUpdateTime,
                                                                          java.lang.Long maxUpdateTime,
                                                                          int page,
                                                                          int limit,
                                                                          boolean descending,
                                                                          java.util.Set<java.lang.String> orderBys)
                                                                   throws com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException
        Get cluster config based on user params. If empty strings are passed for they are treated as nulls (not false).
        Parameters:
        name - cluster name (can be a pattern)
        statuses - valid types - Types.ClusterStatus
        tags - tags for the cluster
        minUpdateTime - min time when cluster configuration was updated
        maxUpdateTime - max time when cluster configuration was updated
        limit - number of entries to return
        page - page number
        descending - Whether results returned in descending or ascending order
        orderBys - The fields to order the results by
        Returns:
        the Clusters found matching the criteria
        Throws:
        com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException - For any error

                                                     throws com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException
        Add new configuration files to a given cluster.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the cluster to add the configuration file to. Not null/empty/blank.
        configs - The configuration files to add. Not null/empty/blank.
        Returns:
        The active configurations for this cluster.
        Throws:
        com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException - For any error
